marginalia.anchor_text: vniuersalitas sumenda ex p[ar]te reru[m] et no[n] ex p[ar]te signoru[m]

position.marginalia_text: Vniuersalitas ex parte reru[m] et no[n] ex p[ar]te signor[um]

marginalia.translation: Universality is from a part of things and not from a part of signs.

position.marginalia_text: Numerus ang[ulorum] rectoru[m] in polygonijs figuris co[n]te[n]tor[um]

marginalia.translation: The number of right angles enclosed in polygonal shapes.

marginalia.anchor_text: prius v[niuersa]le inest o[mn]i triangulo et p[er] posterius i[d est] per particularisatione[m] et resolutionem cuilibet figure

position.marginalia_text: Prius inest tria[n]gulo est posterius alijs polygonijs

marginalia.translation: What is in front in a triangle is behind in other polygons.
Three ways to err about the universal.

underline.text: vniuersalitas sumenda ex p[ar]te reru[m] et no[n] ex p[ar]te signoru[m] vt

subiectu[m] subiciat[ur] vniuersalit[er] p[re]dicato q[ui]d est de o[mn]i p[er] se dicere s[e]c[un]d[u]m q[uod] ip[su]m et tu[n]c v[niuersa]le est q[ua]n[do] p[ro]pria passio inest subiecto s[e]c[un]d[u]m q[uod] ip[su]m et omnino eq[ua]tur subiecto. Cu[m]
aut[em] figura vniuersalit[er] sumpta q[uo]libet sup[er]ficies plana
Unde patet q[uod] quelibet figura polligonia habet om[n]es angulos bis tot rectis equales in quot nu[m]ero triangulos ipsa resoluat[ur]

quare p[er] prius v[niversa]le inest o[mn]i triangulo et p[er] posterius i[d est] per particularisatione[m] et resolutionem cuilibet figure sc[ilicet] s[e]c[un]d[u]m q[uod] ipsa resoluit[ur] in triangulos
esse de om[n]i et p[er] se s[e]c[un]d[u]m q[uod] ip[su]m et
